message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's a unique opportunity to get something truly valuable. I believe it's worth more than what others might be willing to pay, but I'm open to discussing a fair price. Considering its quality and value, I suggest we start with an offer of $95. I hope this aligns with your expectations and we can reach a mutually beneficial agreement.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking to stay within my budget. I would like to propose a price of $80 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your willingness to negotiate. Looking forward to your response.
